itemDescription: British noble; eldest child of Prince Henry of Battenberg and Princess Beatrice of the United Kingdom; grandson of Queen Victoria (1886-1960)

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Mountbatten, 1st Marquess of Carisbrooke,  (born Prince Alexander Albert Victor of Battenberg; 23 November 1886 – 23 February 1960) was a British Royal Navy officer, a member of the Hessian princely Battenberg family and the last surviving grandson of Queen Victoria.
